column1: #Text=2007 U-17 FIFA World Cup : Germany and Colombia draw in goalfest

#Text=Attendance 7,741 Goalscorers for Colombia Julio ( 14 ' ) & Nazarith ( 66 ' & 88 ' ) Goalscorers for Germany Dowidat ( 34 ' & 49 ' ) & Sukuta-Pasu ( 39 ' ) Bookings ( Colombia ) Mosquera , Nazarith & Romero ( Yellow ( 3 ) ) Bookings ( Germany ) Wolze , Gieffer & Rudy ( Yellow ( 3 ) )
#Text=Germany have opened their 2007 FIFA U-17 World Cup campaign with a draw against Colombia in Cheonan , South Korea .
#Text=The opening goal of the match came in 14th minute when Colombia captain Miguel Julio met a free kick with a header .

#Text=The Germans began creating chances before Dennis Dowidat netted a 34th minute equaliser , accelerating past his marker down the right and arrowing a drive into the far top corner from a tight angle .
#Text=The Europeans took the lead just five minutes later after a passing move down the right flank , Richard Sukuta-Pasu converting a low cross to hand his side a 2-1 half time lead .
#Text=The Germans got their 3rd goal of the game with a similar move just after half time .
#Text=Toni Kroos supplied a cross for Dowidat to poke him his second of the game during the 49th minute .
#Text=Colombia tied the game with a penalty shot and a long range goal from Cristian Nazarith in the 66th minute and 88th minute respectively .

#Text=" We knew Colombia were very dangerous at set plays , and that 's how they scored their first goal .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=Nils Teixeira ( GER ) , Germany defender :  After a nervous start , we settled well .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Miguel Julio ( COL ) , Colombia midfielder :  The opening goal should have given us the confidence we needed , but after that we let Germany play far too much football .
